Hearing On American Energy Expansion & National Security On Tuesday, my bill, HR 750-the "Chinese-owned Applications Using The Information of Our Nation Act of 2023" (CAUTION Act)-passed out of the House Committee on Energy and Commerce's Subcommittee on Innovation, Data, and Commerce. The bill is a critical piece of legislation that warns against the dangers of applications with ties to the CCP, and will head to a full Energy and Commerce Committee markup later this Congress.
